Title: Multi-cloud Deployment & Enterprise Integrations

Owner: Claude Code

Description:
Validate deployments on two cloud providers and build connectors for common enterprise systems.

Tasks:
- Test deploy on Cloud A and Cloud B
- Create sample integration connectors (S3/GCS, LDAP/AD)
- Document deployment differences and best practices

Acceptance Criteria:
- Successful deploys on two clouds
- Integration SDK and docs published

Labels: cloud, integrations, priority:medium
